headline: KAL’s cartoon

children.data: Dig deeper into the subject of this week’s cartoon:
A copycat insurrection in Brazil, and its troubling aftermath
The man who would be Trump
Might Jair Bolsonaro try to steal Brazil’s election?
KAL’s cartoon appears weekly in The Economist. You can see last week’s

bodyText:
Dig deeper into the subject of this week’s cartoon:
A copycat insurrection in Brazil, and its troubling aftermath (Jan 2023)
The man who would be Trump (Sep 2022)
Might Jair Bolsonaro try to steal Brazil’s election? (Jul 2022)
KAL’s cartoon appears weekly in The Economist. You can see last week’s here.

parts.headline: This week’s covers
parts.description: How we saw the world

parts.headline: Politics
Business
KAL’s cartoon
Politics
Politics
Business
KAL’s cartoon
The destructive new logic that threatens globalisation
parts.description: America is leading a dangerous global slide towards subsidies, export controls and protectionism

parts.headline: The West should supply tanks to Ukraine
parts.description: Allies have been too cautious about giving it the means to resist Russian aggression

parts.headline: How Brazil should deal with the bolsonarista insurrection
parts.description: Punish those who broke the law, but govern inclusively

parts.headline: America’s trustbusters plan to curtail the use of non-compete clauses. Good
parts.description: The clue is in the name

parts.headline: Fixing Britain’s health service means fixing its family doctors
parts.description: Don’t change the partnership model. Do change the targets

parts.headline: Letters to the editor
parts.subheadline: On Italy, James Callaghan, mental health, education in Sierra Leone, inflation, cricket, The Economist’s cover price
parts.description: A selection of correspondence

parts.headline: Daleep Singh on America’s economic statecraft
parts.description: A former official in the Biden administration says it needs a principled framework for competition

author: The Economist
_metadata.articleBody:
Dig deeper into the subject of this week’s cartoon:
A copycat insurrection in Brazil, and its troubling aftermath (Jan 2023)
The man who would be Trump (Sep 2022)
Might Jair Bolsonaro try to steal Brazil’s election? (Jul 2022)
KAL’s cartoon appears weekly in The Economist. You can see last week’s here.
